name: bj-vtoclg1f1
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: sylbi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0, wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), w0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| w1

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| w1

comment: The FOL content of ~ vtoclg1f (hence not using ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq , ~ df-nfc , ~ df-v ). Note the weakened "major" hypothesis and the disjoint variable condition between ` x ` and ` A ` (needed since the nonfreeness quantifier for classes is not available without ~ ax-ext ; as a byproduct, this dispenses with ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 ). (Contributed by BJ, 30-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
